com.strandgenomics.imaging.iclient
Interface ImageSpace

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImageSpaceSystem
public interface ImageSpace

The main class representing the Enterprise IMG Server at the client side

Author:
arunabha

Method Detail

getHost

String getHost()
returns the host address (of Enterprise IMG Server) connected to, null otherwise

getPort

int getPort()
Returns:
the server port number connected to, -1 otherwise

getUser

String getUser()
Enterprise IMG Server supports authentication.

getAccessKey

String getAccessKey()
returns the access key associated with active user session. the access key is generated by server for given authcode, user and client id. access key is unique for every login. this api fascilitates transfer of user session.

Returns:
access key

setAccessKey

boolean setAccessKey(boolean useSSL,
                     String host,
                     int port,
                     String accessKey)
this call is equivalent to login call but with the given user session

Parameters:
useSSL - true if ssl is used
host - host name of the server
port - port name of the server
accessKey - associated with the session
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise

login

boolean login(boolean useSSL,
              String host,
              int port,
              String appID,
              String authCode)
              throws AuthenticationException
Logs in the user to Enterprise IMG Server

Parameters:
host - the IP address of the Enterprise IMG Server machine
port - the port to use
appID - Client/Application Identifier - obtained after registering the client/Application with iManage (web client)
authCode - the authorization grant obtained by the user for the above mentioned clientID (again using iManage)
Throws:
AuthenticationException

logout

void logout()
Logs out from the iManager server by surrending the underlying acess-token

getActiveProjects

List<Project> getActiveProjects()
The list of active projects that the connected user have permission to read

Returns:
list of active projects that the connected user have permission to read

getArchivedProjects

List<Project> getArchivedProjects()
The list of archived projects that the connected user have permission to browse, may be null otherwise

Returns:
list of active projects that the connected user have permission to read

findProject

Project findProject(String projectName)
find the specified project

Parameters:
projectName - project name
Returns:
project

search

long[] search(String freeText,
              Set<String> projectNames,
              Set<SearchCondition> filters,
              int maxResult)
Search AVADIS IMG Server for records matching the specified search text

Parameters:
freeText - the search text
projectNames - list of projects where the search is restricted (can be null)
filters - list of search conditions
maxResult - maximum number of result to fetch
Returns:
a list of records (their GUIDs)
Throws:
RemoteException

Returns:
the record record for the specified id
